an extensible framework and a platform

everything ultimately catches up with

yeah you know we've been talking about

everything is code first
how to share knowledge and help our

you've talked a lot about what you've

what were the unexpected benefits of

yeah i think the most unexpected benefit
is
how much data there is available to my

and work from visibility is far greater

the other thing i'd add is i think the
big mind shift of what cloud

days
it was often viewed as someone else's

i'm going to decommission my on-prem

but what we've really evolved to

it is a place it's a platform for

on
